metadata.title: CVE-2017-18197 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In mxGraphViewImageReader.java in mxGraph before 3.7.6, theSAXParserFactory instance in convert() is missing flags to prevent XMLExternal Entity (XXE) attacks, as demonstrated by /ServerView.

criterions.comment: libjgraphx-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
